resource.chars:
East India House 
the 19th July 1844.
Sir,
I am commanded by the Court of Directors 
of the East India Company to forward, for communication 
to the Council of the Royal Society, the accompanying 
Papers containing a Report by Lieut.
Ludlow Superintendent of the Magnetical 
Observatory at Madras, of the result of his 
Journey to the South for the purpose 
of observing the Solar Eclipse of 
the 21st December 1843.
I have the honor to be 
Sir,
Your most obedient 
humble Servant,
[text?]
Peter M. Roget Esqre M.D.
&c &c &c
Copy of Para. 1 of Military 
Letter from the Government 
of Madras to the Court of 
Directors dated 26th March
1844, No 16, and its enclosures
